title: Spacious 3 bed/2 bath House Available in New Castle part of Ossining
posting_body: ['New Castle portion of Ossining.', 'Partially furnished.', 'Move in date flexible after 9/1.', 'Spacious 3 bed/2 bath raised ranch.', 'Upstairs is a  modern eat in kitchen, dining room, and formal living room, along with an enormous primary bedroom/ensuite bath, 2 additional bedrooms, and a hall bath.', 'Downstairs, is a cozy (but large) family room/den with a built in woodturning stove, plus a bonus room (can be used as a 4th bedroom or office), laundry room, and 2 car garage.', 'Back deck overlooks beautiful sunsets, large back yard with picturesque stone wall.', 'Quiet, friendly street (no thru traffic!) situated directly between Route 9A and the Taconic State Parkway.', 'Close to Briarcliff Manor, Town of Ossining, and Millwood.', 'Dogs and cats are okay with deposit.', 'Other pets will be considered on a case by case basis.', 'Landlord pays for water, weekly trash/recycling pick up, lawn maintenance, and snow removal.', 'Tenant is responsible for heat (oil), hot water, electric, and other utilities.', 'Furnace and hot water heater were replaced with fuel efficient model in 2021.', 'The house is wired for Verizon FiOs.']
